issue.title: Use of gazebo::msgs:Param and Param_V breaks Gazebo 7 support.

content.raw:
Hi Brian,

I have done some experimentation with this.  The infrastructure for using protobuf messages is present in Gazebo 7, which would support the use of the Param and Param_V messages.  What appears to be missing is the protobuf definitions themselves.
I have tried adding the required protobuf definitions manually to the package and allowing the message library to be generated within the package.  This does allow the plugin to compile, and I have been able to successfully generate a wavefield as shown in the attached image.
![kinetic_wave.jpg](data/bitbucket.org/repo/BgXLzgM/images/1767306395-kinetic_wave.jpg)

Regards,
Jonathan.
content.html:
Hi Brian,

I have done some experimentation with this. The infrastructure for using protobuf messages is present in Gazebo 7, which would support the use of the Param and Param_V messages. What appears to be missing is the protobuf definitions themselves. I have tried adding the required protobuf definitions manually to the package and allowing the message library to be generated within the package. This does allow the plugin to compile, and I have been able to successfully generate a wavefield as shown in the attached image.

Regards, Jonathan.
